Posts.Content: JustStamping wrote: So I finished up my Rads and Chemo treatments in April 2009.  I'd been procrastinating on taking Femara because of troubles I'd had with the other two popular drugs (can't remember their names now).  Also, I'd had troubles on Tamoxifen after my first BC diagnosis/treatment in 1998. So after getting beat up by doctors, family and friends, I finally started taking the Femara.  The joint pain, constipation, hot flashes and fatigue I can handle.  It's these damn chest pains that are not manageable. I get sharp stabbing pain in my upper left chest area.  The pain is not regular but is becoming more frequent.  The pain doesn't last long, but it does strike me with such venegance sometimes that it is agonizing.  I take Advil to control the pain but that too is taking it's toll on my stomach! I've talked to my Onc about this but he insists that chest pain is not a side effect of Femara even though I found it on the Femara web site as well as the side effect pamphlet that comes with my monthly prescription. Does anybody else endure chest pain with Femara?  What kind of pain?  Is the pain localized to one area or does it move?  What do others do for this pain?  Kristin Albrecht Dx 9/12/2008, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, mets, ER+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Femara and Chest Pain JustStamping D_RN

Posts.Content: JustStamping wrote: I am on Taxotere and Cytoxan.  I am scheduled to have my fourth of four treatments tomorrow (02.11).  I had my pre-treatment blood draw today (02.10) and the nurse called me to say my results show Toxic Granulation with Dohle bodies present.  I will see my oncologist tomorrow before treatment and (according to the nurse) he will determine if I am well enough to have treatment. So, what is "Toxic Granulation" ???  Further, what are "Dohle" bodies ??? I'd love to know what others know about these conditions. Thanks in advance! Kristin Albrecht Dx 9/12/2008, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, mets, ER+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Toxic Granulation JustStamping JustStamping
